languages.text: "Ответа не было. Промедление было неприемлемо. Поэтому был найден способ... консервации данного вопроса". {n}Из-под медной маски раздается хриплый вздох:{/n} "И ответ был найден. Эсхатос не должен существовать. Мы исправим свою ошибку".

"There was no answer. Protraction was unacceptable. And so a way was found... to shelve the issue." {n}Brasswhisper gives a raspy sigh.{/n} "And I found the answer. Eschatos should not exist. We will correct our mistake."
languages.original_text: "Ответа не было. Промедление было неприемлемо. Поэтому был найден способ... консервации данного вопроса". {n}Из-под медной маски раздается хриплый вздох:{/n} "И ответ был найден. Эсхатос не должен существовать. Мы исправим свою ошибку".

traits.locale_text: "There was no answer. Tarrying was unacceptable. And so a way was found... to shelve the issue." {n}Nihel sighs raspily.{/n} "And I found the answer. Eschatos should not exist. We will correct our mistake."

"There was no answer. Tarrying was unacceptable. And so a way was found... to shelve the issue." {n}Nihel sighs raspily.{/n} "And I found the answer. Eschatos should not exist. We will correct our mistake."

"There was no answer. Protraction was unacceptable. And so a way was found... to shelve the issue." {n}Nihel gives a raspy sigh.{/n} "And I found the answer. Eschatos should not exist. We will correct our mistake."

"There was no answer. Protraction was unacceptable. And so a way was found... to shelve the issue." {n}Nihel gives a raspy sigh.{/n} "And I found the answer. Eschatos should not exist. We will correct our mistake."

"There was no answer. Protraction was unacceptable. And so a way was found... to shelve the issue." {n}Nihel gives a raspy sigh.{/n} "And I found the answer. Eschatos should not exist. We will correct our mistake."

"There was no answer. Protraction was unacceptable. And so a way was found... to shelve the issue." {n}Nihel gives a raspy sigh.{/n} "And I found the answer. Eschatos should not exist. We will correct our mistake."

languages.text: 「答えはない。議論の延長は受け入れられなかった。そこでひとつの方法に行きつく…問題の先送りだ」{n}ブラスウィスパーはぜいぜいと息を吐く。{/n}「そして私は答えに至った。エスカトは存在すべきでない。過ちを正すのだ」
languages.original_text: "There was no answer. Protraction was unacceptable. And so a way was found... to shelve the issue." {n}Brasswhisper gives a raspy sigh.{/n} "And I found the answer. Eschatos should not exist. We will correct our mistake."

traits.locale_text: 「答えはない。議論の延長は受け入れられなかった。そこでひとつの方法に行きつく…問題の先送りだ」{n}ニヘルはぜいぜいと息を吐く。{/n}「そして私は答えに至った。エスカトは存在すべきでない。過ちを正すのだ」

languages.text: “没人能给出答案。我们无法接受拖延，于是我们决定……暂时搁置这个问题。”{n}铜语发出一声刺耳的叹息。{/n}“而我找到了答案：终焉审判不该存在。我们会纠正我们的错误。”
languages.original_text: "There was no answer. Protraction was unacceptable. And so a way was found... to shelve the issue." {n}Brasswhisper gives a raspy sigh.{/n} "And I found the answer. Eschatos should not exist. We will correct our mistake."

traits.locale_text: “没人能给出答案。我们无法接受拖延，于是我们决定……暂时搁置这个问题。”{n}雅珀发出一声刺耳的叹息。{/n}“而我找到了答案：终焉审判不该存在。我们会纠正我们的错误。”

languages.text: « Il n'y avait pas de réponse. S'attarder trop longtemps sur la question était inacceptable. Un moyen a donc été trouvé de... mettre ce dilemme de côté. » {n}Murmecuivre laisse échapper un soupir rauque.{/n} « Mais moi, j'ai trouvé la réponse. Eschatos ne devrait pas exister. Nous devons corriger notre erreur. »
languages.original_text: "There was no answer. Protraction was unacceptable. And so a way was found... to shelve the issue." {n}Brasswhisper gives a raspy sigh.{/n} "And I found the answer. Eschatos should not exist. We will correct our mistake."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y avait pas de réponse. S'attarder trop longtemps sur la question était inacceptable. Un moyen a donc été trouvé de... mettre ce dilemme de côté. » {n}Nihel laisse échapper un soupir rauque.{/n} « Mais moi, j'ai trouvé la réponse. Eschatos ne devrait pas exister. Nous devons corriger notre erreur. »

languages.text: «No lo sabíamos. Y tampoco podíamos permitirlo por más tiempo, así que dimos con una manera de... dejar de lado el asunto». {n}Susurro de latón suspira roncamente.{/n} «Y yo encontré la respuesta. Eschatos no debía existir. Tendríamos que enmendar nuestro error».
languages.original_text: "There was no answer. Protraction was unacceptable. And so a way was found... to shelve the issue." {n}Brasswhisper gives a raspy sigh.{/n} "And I found the answer. Eschatos should not exist. We will correct our mistake."

traits.locale_text: «No lo sabíamos. Y tampoco podíamos permitirlo por más tiempo, así que dimos con una manera de... dejar de lado el asunto». {n}Nivel suspira roncamente.{/n} «Y yo encontré la respuesta. Eschatos no debía existir. Tendríamos que enmendar nuestro error».

languages.text: "Es gab keine Antwort. Die Protraktion war inakzeptabel. Und wurde ein Weg gefunden ... das Problem zu vertagen." {n}Messingflüsterer seufzt krächzend.{/n} "Und ich habe die Antwort gefunden. Eschatos sollte nicht existieren. Wir werden unseren Fehler korrigieren."
languages.original_text: "There was no answer. Protraction was unacceptable. And so a way was found... to shelve the issue." {n}Brasswhisper gives a raspy sigh.{/n} "And I found the answer. Eschatos should not exist. We will correct our mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Es gab keine Antwort. Die Protraktion war inakzeptabel. Und wurde ein Weg gefunden ... das Problem zu vertagen." {n}Nihel seufzt krächzend.{/n} "Und ich habe die Antwort gefunden. Eschatos sollte nicht existieren. Wir werden unseren Fehler korrigieren."

languages.text: "Yanıt yoktu. Üzerinde daha fazla durmak kabul edilemezdi. Bu yüzden konuyu... Rafa kaldırmanın yolu bulundu." {n}Pirinçfısıltı, kulak tırmalayıcı bir şekilde iç çekiyor.{/n} "Ben yanıtı buldum. Eskatos var olmamalı. Hatamızı düzelteceğiz."
languages.original_text: "There was no answer. Protraction was unacceptable. And so a way was found... to shelve the issue." {n}Brasswhisper gives a raspy sigh.{/n} "And I found the answer. Eschatos should not exist. We will correct our mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Bir yanıt yoktu. Üzerinde daha fazla durmak kabul edilemezdi. Ve konuyu... Rafa kaldırmak için bir yol bulundu." {n}Nihel kulak tırmalayan bir şekilde iç çekiyor.{/n} "Ve ben yanıtı buldum. Eschatos var olmamalı. Hatamızı düzelteceğiz."
